Interface ScreenComponent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component

    public interface ScreenComponent
extends Component
    A common interface for screen component implementations

    Thomas Cashman

          ScreenManager<? extends GameScreen> screenManager,

          float delta)
        Update the screen component
        Parameters:
        game - The GameContainer calling the update
        delta - The time since the last update in seconds

               GameScreenEntity owner,
               float alpha)
        Interpolate the screen component

        alpha - The alpha value to use during interpolation
